derivation: from H1933 (הָוָא) (in the sense of eagerly coveting and rushing upon;
outline:
1. desire
    1. desire (in bad sense)
  2. chasm (fig. of destruction)
    1. engulfing ruin, destruction, calamity
kjv_def: calamity, iniquity, mischief, mischievous (thing), naughtiness, naughty, noisome, perverse thing, substance, very wickedness.
strongs_def: by implication, of falling); desire; also ruin
